seller_description: Millions of Americans suffer from dry eyes. Dry eyes commonly result from not enough tears being produced or tears that dry up too quickly, resulting in dryness and irritation. Luckily, Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops are at the ready with fast-acting relief to soothe dry eye symptoms. Designed to act like your own tears, these artificial tears instantly lubricate and moisturize to temporarily relieve mild and occasional dry, burning, irritated, and uncomfortable eyes. This original-strength formula is safe to use as often as needed and features a gentle preservative, Purite, that breaks down into natural tear components—like oxygen, water and sodium and chloride ions— when applied to the eye. To use Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops: 1. Tilt your head back and look up. 2. Pull your lower eyelid down away from your eyeball to create a “pocket” for the drops. 3. Hold the bottle upside down with the tip just above the pocket. 4. Gently squeeze the bottle and let the eye drop fall into the pocket. Refresh Tears is FSA and HSA eligible. Depending on your plan, you may be able to use your pre-tax dollars to cover this product as an out-of-pocket expense. Trust your dry eyes to Refresh—the #1 doctor-recommended brand with more than 35 years of experience. (Data on file, Abbvie, Inc. REF113774).
review: I had lasik surgery May/2021 and these were the type of eye drops my doctor gave me. My eyes are doing amazing but they feel dry when its windy, staring at a screen for long periods of time, and when I'm in front of the air conditioner. These eye drops work wonders and help my eyes feel better, literally refreshed. They came in a box with two containers and they have a very good expiration date. I usually try to get these at costco when they have discount but offer here was great for the two bottles. Bottles were sealed and had no issues. I will definitely keep buying!
Expected_output: The provided data highlights the comparison between the seller's description, images, and the buyer's review of Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops. According to the seller's description, these drops provide immediate and soothing relief for dry eyes, act like natural tears, and are safe to use as often as needed. The product is well-packaged with two bottles and includes a gentle preservative to maintain eye comfort without irritation. The accompanying seller images showcase the product in its packaging, its ergonomic design, and its portability. The buyer’s review corroborates these claims, stating that the drops effectively relieved dryness and provided a refreshing sensation after LASIK surgery. The buyer found the product's packaging intact, with no issues, and appreciated the inclusion of two bottles at a good value. The provided buyer image confirms the product matches the seller's visual representation, and the buyer’s positive feedback aligns with the product’s promised benefits. There are no visible discrepancies between the product's description, seller images, and buyer feedback. Hence, the buyer expresses satisfaction with the purchase, and the seller has accurately delivered on their promises. No fault lies with either party.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
